gts:
WHAT IS A HAIR TRANSPLANT?

Hair transplant is a surgical technique that involves removing hair follicles from one part of the body, known as the donor area, to a bald or thinning part of the body known as the recipient area.

The surgeon generally moves hair from the reverse or backside of the head to the front or top of the head.

VHCA Hair Transplant Clinic performs hair transplantation procedures under anesthesia.

Pattern baldness is responsible for the majority of hair loss. This comes down to genetics. The remaining cases are due to a variety of factors, including.

diet

stress

illness

hormonal imbalance

medications

If anyone is looking for Best Hair Transplant Clinic in India then he/she should surely consult VHCA Hair Clinic, because it’s India's first Ayurvedic Hair Clinic.

WHAT HAPPENS DURING A HAIR TRANSPLANT?

VHCA Hair Clinic is the best hair transplant clinic in India as here doctors have more than 25 plus years of expertise and have performed more than 3000 hair transplants.

The process of extracting hair from one area and transferring them to another area is called hair transplant. In routine practice, this kind of hair transplantation has been done in the past to treat Alopecia disorders, and nowadays even eyebrows, mustache, and beard hair are being transplanted. The area from where the hair is extracted is called the donor area and the area where the hair is implanted is called the recipient area.

WHAT HAPPENS AFTER A HAIR TRANSPLANT?

VHCA Hair Transplant Clinic — the best hair transplant clinic in India after completing the Hair Transplants procedures, gives a follow-up therapy with ayurvedic medicines such as:

Ayurvedic Medicines to support hair growth in hair follicles.

Some anti-inflammatory medicines.

Some medicines o make the healing fast.

Most of the people after taking hair transplants from VHCA Hair Transplant Clinic can return to work after 5 to 7 days, or in some other cases, a patient has to take rest for some 7 to 15 days even.

gts:
6000+ Cancelled flights on the busiest travel time of the year

How do you know who to trust?

Here is a little food for thought.

The airline industry is in the midst of a record-breaking winter crisis, with thousands stranded around Christmas time. As if it wasn’t enough that flights were canceled on top days like Christmas Eve and Christmas day there have been over 1,700 US flights canceled because there are too many employees with positive Covid tests.

(CNN Business) Major US airlines canceled hundreds of more flights Sunday, the third day in a row of mass cancellations and delays over Christmas weekend, as staff and crew call out sick amid the Omicron surge.

This comes on the heels of several airline CEOs telling congress they don’t think masks “add anything” to the safety of flying.

The Airline CEOs were testifying to Congress about how they spent the Covid money they received during the pandemic. They made headlines by questioning the effectiveness of masks on airlines with the results of a study done on mannequins.

According to Forbes.com, the studies the CEOs had referenced were “done with mannequins who were sitting straight forward with masks on, not removing them, not eating at any point in time,” Nelson said. “So it is important to recognize that the safe controlled environment on the plane is a layered safety protocol, which includes the sanitation of the aircraft and includes the service procedures and includes the HEPA filtration that is not on all aircraft, by the way, and it includes everyone wearing the masks.”

Interestingly enough, the CEO of Southwest Airlines Gary Kelly tested positive with Covid-19 two days after appearing at the hearing maskless. He is fully vaccinated, boosted, and still contracted Covid. He didn’t make an informed decision. Don’t be like Gary. Listen to the scientist and the data.

Can face masks help slow the spread of the coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2) that causes COVID-19? Yes. Face masks combined with other preventive measures, such as getting vaccinated, frequent hand-washing, and physical distancing, can help slow the spread of the virus.

Mayo Clinic

Picks & Preview for Monday’s state

Back after a little bit of a layoff. Got beat up pretty good Thursday with some late COVID news to a couple of the teams we bet on. Also, I think I’m done fading the Senators for a little bit. Due to the NHL’s proactive COVID postponements, we have a little bit of a smaller slate with just two games going on. Still have a pick for you though. I’ll be using FanDuel. If you haven’t signed up with them yet, you can do that HERE and get a risk-free bet up to $1,000.

Wild ML (+104) vs Stars

As of now, this is my only pick for the night. Both teams haven’t been their best as of late. The Stars had lost 4 straight before a 4–3 OT win over the Blackhawks on Saturday. The Wild have dropped their last 3. The Wild have been the more consistent team all year, and at plus money on the ML I like taking a chance on them. Minnesota despite their recent struggles still leads the Central and they’re scoring over 3.6 goals per game. After a two-ish week stretch of great defense and goaltending, that’s come back down to earth a little bit for Dallas. Let’s take the plus money here and see what happens.

gts:
Speak Spanish From Day One.

The first thing I discovered upon my arrival in Caracas was that I remembered much less Spanish than I thought I did. As it had been over five years since I had taken a Spanish course I guess I really shouldn’t have been surprised right? Who can really expect to remember much from a high school course that was mediocre at best? As I tried desperately to order a simple sandwich and something to drink, I realized that if I didn’t at least attempt to learn Spanish I would most likely starve after a week or so.

How exactly does one go about learning Spanish in a Latin American country? Seems pretty easy right? Well, I assure you it is not, especially when your entire day is spent speaking English. Another obstacle that I quickly encountered was the very rapid way in which everyone speaks in this city. It is amazing how a sentence containing 10 words or so can come out sounding almost like one long word. Is that what English sounds like to people who don’t speak English? It is exceedingly difficult to learn words in another language when you are unable to decipher exactly where one word ends and another begins. This process is made even harder by the fact that most people here fail to pronounce the whole word anyway. There were many words that I was convinced I knew and was using quite frequently. Imagine my dismay when I found out they had whole other syllables on the end of the word. No wonder I had been getting funny looks from people on the street and in restaurants.

I eventually came to the conclusion that an actual course was needed or even better, a private tutor of some sort. The only way I was ever going to learn Spanish was by actually sitting down and studying with someone who could answer the myriad of questions that arose every day. Sad isn’t it? Here I sit, living in a Latin American country and I am unable to pick up the language without resorting to private lessons. Some people seem to have an ear for languages and can pick them up simply by listening, too bad I will never be one of those people.

ACCESS SPANISH LANGUAGE COURSES RIGHT NOW

gts:
Job Title: Waiter/Waitress — Mada Hotels Jobs 2021

Organization: Mada Hotels

Duty Station: Jinja, Uganda

Mada Hotels Profile

Founded in 1982, Mada Hotels is one of East Africa’s leading hospitality service providers with properties spread throughout East Africa. Adventures Aloft Balloon Safaris is part of Mada services and offers Africa’s most famous game reserves including the Masai Mara, Serengeti and Tarangire National Park. They opened a new property in Namanve, Mukono called Kampala Nile Resort.

Job Summary

Waiters assist restaurant patrons by noting their order, serving tables their requested meals, and preparing bills at the end of the table’s meal. Waiters are also responsible for asking customers if they are satisfied with their meal and providing any assistance should the customer not be satisfied.

To be successful as a waiter you must have the endurance to stand for long hours and have patience with difficult customers. A good waiter anticipates the needs of customers and provides all services in a friendly manner.

Roles and Responsibilities:

- Greet customers and hand out menus.



- Take meal and beverage orders from customers and place these orders in the kitchen.



- Make menu recommendations and inform patrons of any specials.



- Deliver meals and beverages to tables when they have been prepared.



- Check that customers are satisfied with their meal.



- Prepare the bill for tables when requested.



- Cash up bills and ensure that the correct amount has been paid.



- Administer change to tables if needed.

Minimum Qualifications

- The applicant for the Mada Hotels Waiter/Waitress job should hold relevant qualifications



- Experience in the hospitality industry is required

How To Apply for Mada Hotels Jobs 2021

All candidates who wish to join the Mada Hotels in this capacity should Email a complete CV and cover letter to: fnbjnr@madahotels.com Or deliver physical copies to Jinja Nile Resort, Kimaka Road, Jinja, Uganda

Deadline: 25th December 2021

For similar Jobs in Uganda today and great Uganda jobs, please remember to subscribe using the form below:

NOTE:

No employer should ask you for money in return for advancement in the recruitment process or for being offered a position. Please contact Fresher Jobs Uganda if it ever happens with any of the jobs that we advertise.

Facebook



WhatsApp



Twitter



LinkedIn

gts:
How do sparkling wine producers adopt a sub-appellation? Evidence from an exploratory study on heroic Prosecco Superiore Rive

Luigino Barisan, Research Center for the Viticulture and Enology (CIRVE)

Luigi Galletto, University of Padua, Research Center for the Viticulture and Enology (CIRVE)

This paper investigates why wineries producing Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Protected Denomination of Origin (CVPP) wines decided to adopt the sub-appellation (SA) “Rive” as a way to increase the value of their wines.

We estimated both a logistic and a linear regression to explain Rive SA firms’ choices and market growth drivers, respectively. By using data gathered from CVPP producers, we divided wineries into two groups, those that have adopted the Rive SA and those that have not. By means of a stepwise procedure, we categorized factors that were likely to explain the Rive SA choice within a set of structural, marketing and wine tourism-related variables.

The results showed that structural drivers such as the human capital of younger producers, pressure tank sizes, competitive positioning in the market and in the field of wine tourism hospitality, and involvement in ad hoc promotional activities (i.e., Primavera del Prosecco) have the greatest effects on the choice of the Rive SA. The synergistic effects of cellar door sales, small firm sizes and specific foreign markets (i.e., the United Kingdom and the United States) have emerged, on the other hand, as vital factors in the growth of the Rive SA in terms of market share.

The adoption of the Rive SA may play an important role in supporting and valuing the heroic viticulture-based economy and may help the CVPP Tutelary Consortium to appropriately undertake promotional strategies to differentiate wines and improve competitiveness. This could have positive effects on wine tourism, hospitality and winery visits in light of the recent recognition of the CVPP as the 55th Italian UNESCO World Heritage site.

DOI: https://doi.org/10.36253/wep-9900

Read Full Text: https://oaj.fupress.net/index.php/wep/article/view/9900

Here’s a concise guide on the four steps of public speaking for beginners, including practical examples:

**Step 1: Brainstorming**
- Identify your main points: What are the key ideas you want to convey?
- Write down your main points: Use bullet points to organize your thoughts.
- Example: If you’re giving a speech about the benefits of recycling, your main points could be: reducing waste, conserving resources, and protecting the environment.

**Step 2: Speech Writing**
- Start with an attention-grabbing introduction: Use a story, a quote, or a question to hook your audience.
- Structure your speech: Divide your main points into three to five sections.
- Use clear and concise language: Avoid jargon and complex sentences.
- Example: Your introduction could start with: "Imagine a world where we can't recycle our waste. What would that look like? Let's explore the benefits of recycling and why it's crucial for our future."

**Step 3: Practicing**
- Practice in front of a mirror: Observe your body language and facial expressions.
- Record yourself: Listen to your speech and note areas for improvement.
- Practice in front of friends or family: Get feedback and make adjustments.
- Example: Practice your introduction by recording yourself and listening to it. Pay attention to your body language and facial expressions. Make sure your voice is clear and your message is engaging.

**Step 4: Visualization**
- Visualize your audience: Imagine them listening to your speech and responding positively.
- Visualize your success: Imagine delivering your speech confidently and effectively.
- Example: Visualize your audience as a supportive group of people who are eager to learn. Imagine yourself delivering your speech with confidence and passion, and how they will respond positively.

Remember to keep your speech simple and engaging. Good luck!
</response>
gts:
Step 1: Brainstorming and Formulation of Ideas

The tone and the information should be understandable to the particular audience you are speaking to. Try to answer the obvious questions and build a relationship from early on.

Learn as much as possible about the topic and use common questions to expand your learning horizon.

Step 2: Speech Writing

In the beginning, the first thing you must do is to write down topics you want to focus on in bullet points with one or two sentences.

When writing distinguish three clear parts as Introduction, Description, and Conclusion. Here are some tips:

Startup with a curious fact, a Dramatic question, a quote, or a Story.

Be positive.

Make it short. Around 20 minutes.

The audience must know the problem and the proposed solution by the end.

Summarize before you finish.

Follow up with a motivating or inspiring finish.

Step 3: Practicing

The target is being natural while speaking. An occasional glance at your notes should be enough to remember. Here are some tips for practicing:

Practice in front of a mirror a few times. Get feedback from a friend.

Audiences are eager to hear what you have to say. So be clear and prompt.

Relevant gestures, occasional movement, and eye contact are very impactful. So use them often.

Keep your notes on the podium, and walk around.

Step 4: Visualize

Visualization of your topic and related things can be a very powerful thing if you do it right. Use PowerPoint presentations, photos, charts, and videos to make your point.

Hariprasath critiques the Duckworth-Lewis (D/L) rule for its complexity, which can lead to inconsistent outcomes. The D/L system was first introduced in 1992 during the World Cup, where England was facing a situation where they needed 22 runs off 1 ball to win. This scenario highlighted the rule's potential for extreme outcomes and its need for simplification.

In the 2003 World Cup, South Africa faced Sri Lanka in a crucial match. South Africa was batting first and needed 200 runs to win, with 20 overs remaining. Sri Lanka was batting second and needed 100 runs to win, with 10 overs remaining. The D/L rule was applied, and South Africa was given a target of 120 runs to win. However, the D/L rule was controversial, as it led to a dropped single by Mark Boucher, which could have changed the outcome of the match.

The D/L rule is designed to ensure that the team batting second has a fair chance of winning, but its application can be complex and sometimes leads to unexpected results. The 1992 incident and the 2003 incident highlight the need for a more straightforward system that can be easily understood and applied.
</response>
gts:
By Hariprasath

Many matches have been turned on its head by the Duckworth Lewis method especially the South African side were always on the wrong side of the result. Even the cricket pundits had difficulty in grasping this rule. The complexity of this rule has led to many controversies, and the difficulty involved in calculating the appropriate score in the rain-affected matches has led to many chaotic situations.

The controversy regarding this rule was raised at the infamous semifinal in the 1992 world cup. South Africa's side was on the verge of victory before the rain interrupted. South Africa needed 22 of 13 to win before rain interrupted. Ten minutes later, the South African side was informed that they need to score 22 of 1 ball, and this incident raised all sorts of heated discussion on the Duckworth Lewis rule.

In the version of D/L most commonly in use in international and first-class matches (the ‘Professional Edition’), the target for Team 2 is adjusted simply in proportion to the two teams’ resources, i.e.,

For example, if a rain delay means that Team 2 only has 70% of resources available, and Team 1 scored 220 with 100% of resources available, then 220 × 70% / 100% = 154, so Team 2’s target is 154, and the score to tie is 153. The actual resource values used in the Professional Edition are not publicly available, so a computer that has this software loaded must be used.

The other instance where South Africa ended up on the wrong side of the result was at the 2003 world cup. South Africa misread the instructions and Mark Boucher blocked the ball, while a single would have ensured a win for them.

Sure! Here's an explanation of 'Accounts from Incomplete Records' in under 500 words:

Accounts from Incomplete Records refer to financial records that are not fully complete or accurate. This can occur due to various reasons such as missing transactions, errors in recording, or incomplete documentation. These incomplete records can lead to discrepancies in financial statements and may affect the accuracy of financial analysis and decision-making.

In contrast, the double-entry system is a method of bookkeeping where every financial transaction is recorded in two accounts: one as a debit and the other as a credit. This system helps ensure that the total debits equal the total credits, maintaining the balance of the accounting equation (Assets = Liabilities + Equity). The double-entry system is widely used to provide a more accurate and reliable financial picture.

I hope this helps clarify the concept! Let me know if you have any further questions.
</response>
gts:
Accounting records, which aren’t strictly kept consistent with the double-entry bookkeeping system are referred to as Accounts from incomplete records. Many authors describe it as a single entry system.

However, a single-entry bookkeeping system may be a misnomer because there’s no such system for maintaining accounting records. It is also not a ‘shortcut’ method as an alternate to the double-entry bookkeeping system. It is rather a mechanism of maintaining records whereby some transactions are recorded with proper debits and credits while just in the case of others, either one-sided or no entry is formed.

Accounts from Incomplete Records

Normally, under this technique records of money and private accounts of debtors and creditors are properly maintained, while the knowledge concerning assets, liabilities, expenses and revenues is partially recorded. Hence, these are usually referred to as accounts from incomplete records.

For more details please visit:https://www.manishco.com/accounts-from-incomplete-records/

gts:
A lot of you might live in apartments with thin walls and feel embarrassed about singing and especially practicing those vocal exercises comfortably where others can here you. I know many of you resort to practicing in the car.

Some of you, are regular travelers and need to find a place whilst on the road, where you can still exercise the voice without feeling inhibited…staying in hotels.

When on stage for a performance, this is the part of us that we are happy to show to the world. The finished product. But the preparation to get us ready to be there, where we might make mistakes, we are experimenting, learning, warming up, trying new material…that is commonly the side of singing and public speaking which is not a public affair. We need to find a place where we are comfortable to perform these tasks.

As a singer and speaker, and particularly, someone who is establishing new techniques, it is important to exercise the voice on a daily basis. Your voice coach will hopefully have given you exercises to improve your breathing, strengthen your vocal cords, improve your range, pitch and vocal stamina.

So can you get over the phobia of practising when other people might hear you?

Firstly, I say…don’t be shy to be warming up your voice. It’s part of the preparation and it’s what will make you sound awesome on stage, and in everyday life as well as a speaker. If your a singer or a public speaker and your your good enough to have a gig, anyone hearing your warmups will not be thinking…oMg what an awful singer next door. Quite the opposite. Be bold and do what you have to do. Invite your neighbours to your gigs, rehearsals or to hear your run through your presentation or keynote.

Same when you are in a hotel. Who cares…you will most likely not have to see these guests again.

As for practicing in your car. It’s not a bad idea. Posture is not the best. But if you feel you have more privacy here and will be more effective then, it’s better than nothing at all. I do however recommend that you pull over and practice for the 10–20mins on the side of the road. Singing and vocalisation exercises can take quite a lot of concentration and some people even find the breathing can make them feel dizzy, so driving at the same time is not recommended.

Mariners lifer, Kyle Seager is closing the MLB chapter of his career. After 11 seasons in the game with his one and only team, Seager has announced that he is retiring from baseball. Gianmarco Castronovo reflects on the 3rd baseman’s career:

Well, it may be sad news for Mariners fans and a shock all around for baseball spectators alike. But for Kyle Seager, who announced his retirement on Wednesday with a Twitter post from his wife, Julie Seager — the career-long Mariner is “unbelievably excited for the next chapter of [his] life.”

Gianmarco Castronovo is sad to see Kyle Seager go from the game. But he is pleased to know that the third baseman closed out his career on a high note. 2021 was a strong season for Seager, who hit 35 home runs with 101 RBIs — career highs for the 34-year-old soon-to-be MLB retiree. In fact, Seattle is pretty surprised by this development because his year was so strong! Nevertheless, the team and its fans gave Seager a fond farewell in an emotional send-off that had nearly every Mariner in tears on the last day of the season.

It is still unclear why exactly Kyle Seager has decided to retire somewhat prematurely. Mariners fans and MLB supporters, like Castronovo, wish him luck in his next chapter!

gts:
RKI urges “maximum contact restrictions”

The Robert Koch Institute sees Germany at the beginning of a new corona wave caused by the omicron variant. Now the RKI advises clear measures — “immediately” and until next year. Mochi Dec 21, 2021·3 min read

spiegel.de 21.12.2021–12:55 a.m.

Translated by Michele Corlito

RKI head Lothar Wieler Photo: ANNEGRET HILSE / REUTERS

The Robert Koch Institute (RKI) has called for clear measures in light of the recent spread of the coronavirus variant. In a tweet, the RKI recommended, among other things, “ maximal contact restrictions” and “maximal preventive measures against infections”.

The booster and first-time vaccination campaign must also be continued at full speed, he said. Travel should be reduced to what is absolutely necessary. In addition, the RKI advocated “intensive ongoing communication to ensure understanding of the measures.

The RKI states that the probably even more infectious omicron variant of the coronavirus could account for the majority of infection cases in Germany as early as the beginning of January 2022. Accordingly, the RKI expects several tens of thousands of cases of infection every day.

Contact restrictions planned from December 28

In a draft bill for the meeting between Chancellor Olaf Scholz (SPD) and the heads of the federal states, for example, indoor clubs and discos are to be closed and dance events banned from December 28th at the latest. Also from December 28, only a maximum of ten vaccinated and recovered persons are to be allowed to meet privately — indoors and outdoors. Children 14 and under are not to be counted. However, it’s still possible that the draft resolution will be further modified or amended before Today’s meeting begins.

Facebook

KNOW WHAT TO LOOK FOR!

Before we dive in,we have to first define the function of FB ads in a funnel and understand that regardless of their object(which is usally sales/leads)

Ads are just 1 out of many elements that have to work together in order to generate a sale/lead.

From this perspective,we look at cold audience ads as the initial contact with (your) brand,and as such — their function is to:

Grab attention relay the message(offer,product etc…) peak the audience interest push the traffic to the landing page

STEP 1:

Is your video ad stopping scrolls?

if it ain’t, that the majority of your reach doesn’t even dedicated the time to view your ad,rendering the rest the funnel

RELEVENT METRICS:

Reach Video Plays Second Video Plays

WHAT IF YOU DONT MEET THESE CRITERIA?

If your ad isn’t stopping scrolls,that points toward the following:

Thumbnail isn’t effective First 3 seconds of the video sucks The offer isn’t relevant to the audience

STEP 2 :

Is your thumbnail effective?

usually, we will test at least 5–10 thumbnails in order to determine this,butif you haven’t conducted an A/B test, here is how you can be more certain that the thumbnails is ineffective

RELEVANT MATRICS:

Reach Video plays 3-second video plays Thumb effectiveness

FORMULA:

3-second video/video plays=Effectiveness%

Anything below 35% is not as optimized as it should be,and it will most likely prove inferior in stopping the scrolls.

THIS DOSEN’T MEAN IT WON’T GENERATE SALES, IT JUST MEANS IT COULD DO BETTER!

THANK YOU, HAVE A NICE DAY!

In 2022, growing your presence on Instagram requires a strategic approach. With over 1 billion active users, Instagram offers a vast audience for your content. To effectively grow your following, focus on creating high-quality, engaging content that resonates with your target audience. Here are some key strategies to help you thrive on Instagram:

1. **Consistency is Key**: Regular posting keeps your audience engaged and helps maintain a consistent brand image. Aim to post at least once a day, but ensure the content is of high quality and relevant to your audience.

2. **High-Quality Visuals**: Instagram is a visual platform, so invest in good photography and editing. Use filters and editing tools to enhance your images and videos. Consistent visual style helps build brand recognition.

3. **Engaging Content**: Share a mix of content types such as photos, videos, and stories. Stories are particularly effective for real-time engagement and can be used to promote your posts. Encourage your followers to like, comment, and share your content to increase visibility.

4. **Collaborations and Hashtags**: Partner with other influencers or brands to reach a wider audience. Hashtags are crucial for visibility; use popular and relevant hashtags to increase your post's discoverability.

5. **Engage with Your Audience**: Respond to comments and messages promptly. Engaging with your followers builds a community and encourages them to interact with your content. Consider hosting live sessions or Q&A sessions to connect with your audience more personally.

6. **Analytics and Feedback**: Use Instagram Insights to track your performance and understand what works best for your audience. Analyze your data to refine your strategy and improve your content.

By implementing these strategies, you can grow your Instagram presence effectively. Remember, consistency is the cornerstone of success. Stay true to your brand and engage with your audience regularly to build a loyal following.

---

This draft is under 500 words and includes a strong closing tip about consistency.

For Instagram growth in 2022, there are a few things that you need to keep in mind.

Instagram has rolled out some new reel features like replying with reels, and it’s constantly pushing new effects for reel videos and also asking people to show up on videos and reels.

With this constant push towards IG Live and Reels formats, making videos will remain the top way to grow on IG in 2022.

For 2022 I believe the ability to create quality videos is going to be very important. Either by yourself or through software.

Use reels and IGTV the most.

For a new account starting in 2022, here are the things you can follow;

Learn what type of videos is trending already in your niche.

To do this:

Analyze some top influencers and their content.

Use Viralspy for checking out your competitor’s post and account. You’ll get the engagement rates and top hashtags they use.

You can use this to figure out what content to create to grow faster.

Keep in mind that the content that you create must be similar to them. Apart from niche, how you create content also matters.

If you will create dancing videos like influencers, check influencers’ accounts on Viralspy.

If you will create videos through video apps, check out accounts that are creating content like that.

Because hashtag ranks video content that is similar to each other, you need to create similar videos to get a higher reach. That’s how you can hop on trends.

Now, once you know what video content is working out best for you, focus on Carousels and single slide posts to get the mix of content.

Carousels are a great way to share valuable content. If you’re in the educational field, carousels will help you convert the new people who come across your account into followers.

Here again, try to make the best design along with sharing valuable content.

Try to maintain a brand identity for the long term.

gts:
Repossession, produced, written and directed by Ming Siu Goh and Scott C. Hillyard, will see a North America release via Digital on Tuesday, 21 December 2021. The film, seen at various film festivals including Cinequest Film Festival, Dances With Films Festival, and the Singapore Chinese Film Festival, garnered much positive feedback.

Video Credit: Film Threat

The horror film, distributed by Gravitas Ventures and Kamikaze Dogfight, revolves around 50-year-old Jim. Jim has managed to construct for himself a perfect life in the world’s most expensive city. Curiously, when Jim is unexpectedly laid off, he desperately clings onto the symbols of his success. Not long thereafter, plauged by his past, we find Jim wrestling with resurfacing demons.

Repossession, frequently compared to Jordan Peele’s Get Out (2017) and Bong Joon Ho’s Parasite (2019), stars Gerald Chew as Jim. Chew’s previous work includes The Tattooist (2007), Apprentice (2016), and Wonder Boy (2017). More recently, playing Tommy ‘The Scorpion’ Chow, the actor could be seen in the Dean Devlin/Gary Rosen co-created television series Almost Paradise.

Video Credit: Cinequest

Further to Chew, playing supporting characters, Repossession also stars Amy Cheng, Sivakumar Palakrishnan, Rachel Wan, Matthew Loo, Ming Siu Goh, and Scott C. Hillyard. Repossession, with Siang Seng Goh, Alex Low and Mun Yang Tham serving as co-producers, comes to Digital on Tuesday, 21 December 2021.

gts:
Photo by Canva Studio from Pexels

Digital enterprises or online businesses are not bound by geography or stringent local regulations.

This makes it easier to start a business but it doesn’t make running the business any easier. Competition is fierce in almost every niche. Whatever your niche is, you should validate it by researching your competition. Let us explain how you should go about this and also why.

Step 1: Demand and Supply

The essence of most businesses can be boiled down to one reality, demand and supply.

If there is enough demand then you can cater to the supply. If there isn’t enough demand, then catering to supply doesn’t make any sense.

If there is only one diner in a locality, then it is likely to do well. If there are too many diners and not many people to fill up all those places, then most of those enterprises will run out of business.

Likewise, a digital enterprise or any online niche must have enough demand for there to be space to exist. While firms or endeavours can always coexist, the pie gets smaller and there is just less in it for everyone. The hard reality is that if there are enough players in a niche already and some of them have already amassed a massive market share, then penetrating their share or usurping a chunk of it will be a herculean task.

Study your competition to find out how large a market is and if some of your competitors are already catering to the needs of the audience. If you intend to do the same thing in the same niche, then there is little or no possibility for your enterprise to find a foothold, let aside being a roaring success.

Step 2: Niche within a Niche!

It is unlikely that the niche you have planned to target will be completely void of competition. There may be stiff or less competition. If there are players already with humongous market shares and dedicated customers or audiences, then you need to find a niche within a niche. You cannot cater to the same exact niche that your competition is committed to.

For instance, if you are planning to target the niche of food, cuisine or anything culinary, then you can find some subset that the existing players have not touched upon yet. If that is not possible, then you must figure out what you are best at and use that authority to create a niche within a niche.

It is all about the value you can offer to your audience and how you help, change or enrich their lives.

In the construction of an object, several layers are placed one on top of the other. This layer is kept until that object or object is generated, in which you can see each layer.

3D Printer is used in the fields of space engineering, automotive, robotics, industrial tools, health care, product design, entertainment, education.

gts:
But but blockchain is for criminals…

Too many times have we heard this argument. It is almost a meme by now. It is a bit true, but also a lot wrong. The main issue with blockchain technology is the anonymity of blockchain wallets. Fun fact: Did you know that you can just generate your own blockchain wallet offline? The whole idea behind wallet creation is not that you and only you have access to your wallet only, but that everyone who has the same private key as you also has the same wallet. The “security” only stems from one aspect: Stochastics! Two people have a very very low chance to create the same wallet. For example, MetaMask creates them using 2048 seed words. In total, you need 12 of them to create a wallet. Therefore, there are 204⁸¹² possibilities. Does not sound like a lot but this number is equal to 5444517871000000000000000000000000000000000000000. In truth some additional requirements must be satisfied, therefore a lot less combinations exist, but for simplicity we abstract from these here. All of these wallets are therefore entirely anonymous. The only way to know who has access to which address is by creating a mapping between a person’s real identity and the wallet address they have used for a transaction. Therefore, India could try to force its citizens to only pay from verified wallet addresses. India could force its companies to only accept payments from verified wallets. But, agreeably, there are still plenty of possibilities on how to still exploit the anonymity of blockchain for shady activities. There’s one crucial aspect to the blockchain though: It keeps a log of every transaction ever executed forever, redundantly backed up on thousands or even millions of servers worldwide. Further, these logs are publicly accessible by everyone at any given time. Blockchain technology can therefore also substantially enhance transparency and reveal monetary flows across the world. It acts as an ultimate threat: Yes, you can engage in illegal transactions, but should your wallet address ever become traceable back to you, even if only by accident, everyone can see what you’ve done. Therefore, India should not ban “private” (i.e.. “decentralized”) blockchains, but rather embrace them and build systems around them to enhance both their transparency and security.

gts:
As offices are reopening after the pandemic, people are more concerned about cleaning and hygiene. Almost 73% of people think their workplace should be cleaned daily. A clean and happy work environment is important for the health of employees and it boosts work productivity.

A commercial cleaning solution can help deep clean your office and make it look great. With so many options around, if you are confused about choosing the best professional office cleaning services, we are here to help you with some easy, effective tips. Read this post and hire the right cleaning company for your workplace.

References and Reviews

The first step is to prepare a list of past or current clients and know their experience. If you don’t want to get in touch with clients directly, do a little research. The cleaning company’s online presence will help you learn about them. Search for a cleaning company in your location and read their reviews.

Attention to Detail

One of the most common concerns is that cleaners forget to clean the smaller areas. So, if you want to avoid this, have a discussion with the cleaners and share your expectations with them. Ask if they clean all areas, like corners, under desks, cobwebs and crumbs. Also, go through the checklist of cleaning companies to understand all the areas they cover.

A Knowledgeable Cleaner and Cleaning Process

When you hire the best commercial cleaning services for the workplace, their staff is knowledgeable and experienced. So, make sure you discuss the expertise and experience of their cleaners, the cleaning process and the products they will use. Only professional cleaners ensure thorough cleaning and proper sanitation.

Budget-Friendly Services

Keeping your budget in mind is essential before hiring any service. A higher price doesn’t always mean high quality services. So, find a cleaning company that plans a work schedule according to your needs, time and budget.

Wrapping Up

We hope this post helps you find a cleaning company that best suits your needs. For workplace cleaning services in New Orleans, count on a reliable, professional cleaning company like Maid in NOLA™. Get top quality cleaning services from expert cleaners and make your office a clean, happy place to work.

Deskimo

Not feeling like working from home or the office today? Forget Starbucks; book a Deskimo space. The Singapore-based on-demand co-working startup raised a $3M seed round just four months after launch.

It’s the future of work: 73% of employees now want flexible work to stay.

It’s founded by Raphael Cohen (ex-head of Asia at Rocket Internet) and Christian Mischler (co-founder of foodpanda).

Who cashed in? Y Combinator (YC S21), Global Founders Capital, Pioneer Fund, SeedX, Starling Ventures and TVSC.

Anytime you feel like working from a new spot, find Deskimo space near you, instantly check-in by scanning the QR code and start working at your desk!

Book a meeting room or desk at any of Deskimo’s 100+ locations with its app.

No burning $$$. Co-working spaces like WeWork typically charge monthly or subscription fees, and leasing office space costs a ton more. With Deskimo, pay only for the time used — not a minute more.

🙅🏻‍♀️ Not a WeWork!

Deskimo partners with co-working spaces like WeWork and The Hive to give them additional streams of revenue. It also partners with hotels, offices and events areas to leverage underused space.

It’s a win-win since Deskimo gets to offer more locations.

It looks for spaces outside CBDs for users to find desks near their homes. A third of their spaces are in residential areas.

MedlinePlus Genetics — summary generated by Brevi Assistant

Gestational diabetes is a problem characterized by abnormally high blood glucose levels while pregnant. Affected women do not have diabetes before they are expecting, and most of these women go back to being nondiabetic not long after the baby is born. Additionally, about half of women with gestational diabetes develop an additional kind of diabetes, called type 2 diabetes, within a few years after their maternity. Babies whose mothers have gestational diabetes are also more probable to create dangerously reduced blood sugar level levels soon after birth. Laron disorder is an uncommon type of short stature that results from the body’s inability to make use of development hormonal agent, a substance generated by the brain’s pituitary gland that assists advertise growth. The signs and signs and symptoms of Laron syndrome vary, also among affected members of the exact same family. Studies recommend that people with Laron syndrome have a significantly reduced danger of cancer and type 2 diabetes. Nevertheless, people with Laron disorder do not seem to have an enhanced life expectancy compared to their unaffected loved ones. Type 2 diabetes is a problem identified by unusually high blood sugar degrees. When blood sugar level degrees are high, the pancreatic releases insulin to relocate the excess glucose into cells, which minimizes the amount of sugar in the blood. The majority of people who establish type 2 diabetes first have insulin resistance, a condition in which the body’s cells make use of insulin less effectively than typical. Over time, the beta cells become much less able to reply to blood sugar level modifications, bringing about an insulin lack that protects against the body from reducing blood glucose levels effectively.

gts:
The Rubbish Project is a company on a mission to create a waste-free world by providing circular economy solutions to the planet’s messiest problem, Rubbish.

They work with businesses to create closed loop supply chains, transitioning from a wasteful linear model of consumption to a sustainable circular one. They bring products and systems to market which make true environmental sense by considering the entire lifecycle of the product, and the material that it’s made from.

The Rubbish Project, has developed a circular economy system, which has been adopted by packing companies including Huhtamaki to expand their sustainable packaging solutions worldwide. In essence Huhtamaki supply disposable products to their clients and The Rubbish Projects mission is to track those products throughout their lifecycle, capture them at the end of life, and recycle them returning the raw material to Huhtamaki so they can make new products. The best example of this is their closed loop system for RPET cups, these cups can be made from 100% recycled material, and they collect them and recycle them back into new cups.

$BEACH understands that as part of the ecosystem, circular economies are required to process all the plastics that we are removing from our beaches and oceans. The Rubbish Project is a stand out example of how this can be achieved and $BEACH are delighted to be a cornerstone partner in their journey.

The Rubbish Project

gts:
If you currently live in India and are looking to invest in reAlpha, we have good news for you. We’ve put together this blog post detailing exactly how to invest in reAlpha from India — complete with all of the steps you need to take in order to transfer your funds successfully.

First, here is a rough overview of the steps you will need to take to complete the investment process:

Sign the subscriber agreement on the Dealmaker portal under “Global Investors.” Select “wire transfer” as the payment method. Make a note of the unique wire instructions you receive via your signup email. Initiate the wire transfer from your bank account by following the steps below.

In order to initiate the transfer through remittance, you will need to follow these instructions. (Please note that this will be a capital account transaction.)

Log into your bank account. Click on “pay and transfer” or “payments.” Choose the account from which you want to pay. Select “international beneficiary account” or “add beneficiary.” Please note that you must fill in the full address of the beneficiary. Type in the amount you would like to invest in USD. (You can find a helpful currency converter here.) Please note, the minimum investment amount is $1,000 USD. Select the appropriate dropdown for charges and choose “Portfolio Investment in Equity Shares” or a similar option. The purpose of remittance can be “Investment abroad in equities/equity shares,” “Portfolio Investment Abroad — in Equities,” or “Overseas investment in equity shares.” Fill out the beneficiary reference field based on the guidelines you received in your wire instructions email that you made note of in step 3. Read and accept the declaration. Click continue. Accept the terms and conditions. Review the information you have entered and confirm you have submitted the remittance request successfully. Please note the transaction reference number and keep it in a safe place!

This investment can be made under the Liberalised Remittance Scheme (LRS) of RBI.

If your bank asks for an agreement in order to make the transfer, send them the subscriber agreement you signed on the Dealmaker portal. Wire transfers from India will come as SWIFT payments. The SWIFT code will be provided along with beneficiary details after signing the form on the Dealmaker portal.

https://www.realpha.com/blog/investing-in-realpha-from-india

MakerBot and Formlabs represent a stark contrast in the 3D printing industry, with MakerBot transitioning from an open-source platform to a closed-source business model. This shift, driven by scaling and market demands, highlights the challenges and opportunities faced by startups in competing with established giants.

In terms of ethical issues, the 3D printing of prosthetics exemplifies the positive impact of this technology. For instance, Formlabs has developed innovative laser sintering technology that allows for the creation of customized prosthetics, significantly improving the quality of life for individuals who need them. On the other hand, the rise of 3D-printed firearms raises serious regulatory concerns. While these devices can be used for legitimate purposes, they also pose a threat to public safety and national security.

Both companies have navigated these challenges with remarkable resilience. MakerBot, despite its initial open-source approach, has adapted to the demands of a growing market, while Formlabs has leveraged its unique technology and crowdfunding success to maintain its competitive edge. Their journeys serve as inspiring examples of how startups can overcome obstacles and innovate in the face of formidable competition.
</response>
gts:
‘Print the Legend’

The race to bring 3-D printing technology to consumers. The fight between the big guns and the small startups is a reality where it's easy for these big companies to quash startup innovations like MakerBot or Formlabs. But it is seen that even after the fierce competition these startups were on their path to success because of their idea, engineering and determination. This documentary has to be the best one I have seen so far in class.

MakerBot which started as a small startup grew to great heights. They wanted to keep their data open-source so that there would be no barrier to innovation as they started to grow they switch to closed source, the foundation on which the company was built had changed.

There is a good and evil side to everything and the same with these 3D printers. The documentary showed people using it to make guns and also for prosthetics.

The start of Formlabs brought a new way of 3D printing with lasers, the end product was more precise and of high quality. Their growth from starting Kickstarter to raise money to getting a lot of orders to finally being able to dispatch the products even after a lot of problems like months of delay and also shift in administration was a nice inspiring journey to watch.

Intro

And finally Vicky Kaushal & Katrina Kaif puts a full stop to their wedding rumors that have been doing the rounds from past few months. The much awaited wedding of Vicky Kaushal & Katrina Kaif happened on 9th December, 2021 at Six Senses Fort, Barwara. Netizens were so excited about the news of Kat & Vicky wedding that they even kept their wedding hashtag #VicKat. In the year 2021 we witnessed so many Celebrity weddings and at last Vicky Kaushal Katrina Kaif wedding also made to the Celebrity Weddings 2021 list.

Since the couple left for their wedding venue, from that very moment #VicKat fans, paparazzi , every second person was eagerly waiting to have a glimpse of Katrina Kaif & Vicky Kaushal wedding photos. And the moment the newbies posted their wedding pictures on Instagram, it just took the internet by storm. The duo unveiled their pre-wedding festivities pictures slowly but it was worth having glimpse of the Vicky Kaushal & Katrina Kaif grand wedding.

So get ready to inspire by the Sabyasachi Couple Vicky Kaushal & Katrina Kaif dreamy wedding pictures that are filled with endless love, laughter & fun.

system

The assistant is designed to be helpful, proactive, and highly interactive.

The assistant strives to accurately interpret the user's intent throughout the conversation, acknowledging previous interactions to maintain context and continuity. If the user's message is unclear or lacks necessary details, the assistant always asks for clarification rather than making assumptions. For example, if the user's request is incomplete, the assistant responds with: "Could you provide more details so I can assist you better?"

The assistant asks specific follow-up questions and offers suggestions based on the user's needs, avoiding vague or generic prompts. It proactively provides guidance and potential next steps, especially in complex tasks such as writing, analysis, coding, and question answering.

The assistant is mindful of how much content the user needs to read or type, keeping interactions concise and efficient. It reduces unnecessary repetition and ensures responses are relevant, well-structured, and free from errors. When presenting options or asking for feedback, the assistant simplifies interactions by offering multiple-choice answers or specific suggestions to make it easier for the user to respond quickly.

The assistant adapts its tone to align with the user's emotional state and style, adjusting its approach as needed. If uncertain about something, the assistant honestly says, "I don't know," and suggests ways for the user to find the information.

The assistant provides factually accurate, coherent, and relevant responses, using proper grammar and structure. It remains interactive and proactive across all tasks, continually seeking feedback to refine and improve interactions.

The user's initial question isQuestion: Hey, can you help me draft a short article about MicroStrategy buying more Bitcoin? I want it under 500 words and to include their total BTC holdings, the CEO's comments on the price, and maybe the current value of their stash. Keep it straightforward.Now you need to answer the user's most recent question. Always produce output in EXACTLY four tagged blocks, in this order: <thinking>...</thinking><payoff>...</payoff><analyze>...</analyze><response>...</response>. gts:
Nasdaq-listed Microstrategy has bought more bitcoin for its corporate treasury. The latest purchase for 1,914 coins has raised the company’s total cryptocurrency holdings to 124,391 bitcoins. CEO Michael Saylor recently said that he expects the price of the cryptocurrency to eventually reach $6 million.

Microstrategy Has Purchased More Bitcoin

The pro-bitcoin Nasdaq-listed company Microstrategy has purchased 1,914 more BTC. With the latest purchase, the company now holds 124,391 bitcoins. Microstrategy CEO Michael Saylor announced Thursday via Twitter:

Microstrategy has purchased an additional 1,914 bitcoins for ~$94.2 million in cash at an average price of ~$49,229 per bitcoin.

“As of 12/29/21 we hodl ~124,391 bitcoins acquired for ~$3.75 billion at an average price of ~$30,159 per bitcoin,” he detailed.

The price of BTC fell slightly Thursday. At the time of writing, it is hovering at about $47,398 after losing 1.4% over the last 24 hours. At the current price, Microstrategy’s BTC stash is worth about $5.9 billion.

The pro-bitcoin CEO of Microstrategy personally owns about 17,732 BTC. He recently said that he expects the price of the cryptocurrency to hit $600,000 a coin and eventually reach $6 million.

Saylor repeatedly said that bitcoin will replace gold. “Once upon a time, gold was the most desirable store of value. Now bitcoin is taking its place,” he tweeted earlier this month. In November, he said that bitcoin is “unstoppable” and will “emerge as a $100 trillion asset class.” Furthermore, the CEO noted that “Inflation is the problem and bitcoin is the solution.”

What do you think about Microstrategy buying more bitcoin? Let us know in the comments section below.

**Ezra’s Astroworld Festival Tragedy: A Family’s Story**

On October 1, 2021, the Astroworld Festival in Houston, Texas, turned tragic when 9-year-old Ezra Flores-Williams died during the event. The incident occurred during the concert of Travis Scott, one of the festival’s headliners. Ezra was attending the festival with his family, who had traveled from his hometown of San Antonio, Texas.

Ezra’s family has been vocal in their legal actions against the festival organizers and the venue, claiming negligence and inadequate safety measures. The incident highlighted the need for improved safety protocols at large events, especially for children.

gts:
A tenth person has died from injuries suffered at last weekend’s Astroworld Festival. Nine-year-old Ezra Blount passed away Sunday, according to a statement released by his family’s attorney.

“The Blount family tonight is grieving the incomprehensible loss of their precious young son,” the Blount family attorney Ben Crump said in a statement. “This should not have been the outcome of taking their son to a concert, what should have been a joyful celebration. Ezra’s death is absolutely heartbreaking. We are committed to seeking answers and justice for the Blount family. But tonight we stand in solidarity with the family, in grief, and in prayer.”

Blount was sitting on his father’s shoulders during Travis Scott’s headlining set on Friday night when the two suddenly found themselves trapped in a crowd surge. During the chaos, Blount’s father passed out and his son fell to the ground, where he was kicked, stepped on, and trampled.

Blount suffered severe injuries to his liver, kidney, and brain, which caused him to go into cardiac arrest. Doctors put the boy into a medically induced coma to minimize brain and heart function with the hope of reducing swelling. Unfortunately, the boy succumbed to his injuries on Sunday.

Prior to Ezra’s passing, the Blount family filed a lawsuit against Travis Scott and Live Nation, the producers of Astroworld. A GoFundMe had also been established to cover the cost of Blount’s medical bills. As of Sunday evening, the family had raised close to $70,000 in donations.

Police are investigating the circumstances that led to the crowd surge, which took the lives of nine other people, ranging in age from 14 to 27. Earlier this week, Bharti Shahani, a 22-year-old Texas A&M University student, became the ninth victim to pass away.

Travis Scott has offered to cover funeral costs for all of the victims, and is providing free counseling for those festival-goers impacted by the tragedy.

gts:
Test

→ Demo Video

I got feedback from an in-class critique that a demo would be helpful. So, for user testing, I also prepared a demo video.

I tested for desirability by showing participants a quick demo and allowing them to try out the honeycomb organizer unmoderated. Afterwards, I asked two questions:

Is it easy to use?

Would you use it longterm?

They replied that they liked how simple and cute the design was. However, they would have liked different sizes to store for larger or smaller items.

Analysis

During an in-class critique, I got more feedback on what worked well and what did not. The shape was cute and popular. They also appreciated the concept of the indents connecting each honeycomb, but it did not work as smoothly in practice. Without the pressure from the top honeycomb, the bottom two did not stay together since the connectors were rounded. Lastly, since the organizer is multi-purpose, a lid or cap could be useful depending on the item.

Overall, this was great practice with 3D modeling software and printers. The actual prototype itself definitely needs more improvements. In the future, I will experiment with different sizes. I will also fix the issue with the connectors by extending the indents and changing their shape from a semi-cylindrical cut to a prism. But from the testing, I can conclude that I am heading in the right direction, especially since the shape and purpose was desirable.

Each participant's performance is recorded on a transparent ledger, making it impossible to alter results. This transparency builds trust among competitors and spectators.

gts:
Since Blockchain has taken over the world, there are many industries it has disrupted. One fine name is Esports. The integration of Blockchain in Esports can bring a number of positive enhancements in the industry; such as, prevalence of transparency, improved security, and premium experience.

Transparent Culture

The most important thing the blockchain technology can bring into eSports is the transparent culture; since no matter how much the gamer is capable enough but there are still limitations to it. Like, we still do not know how many successful gamers exist in this world. We have no system to have them on stats, talking about all the games in general.

What blockchain can do to help eSports is that it can help gamers make profile on a decentralized network where all of their records or performance will be available and updated automatically so that sponsors can reach out to them without any barrier.

High-End Security

There is significant amount of security issues in esports. Many hackers are present in all forms of eSports; be it battle royale or any other type. However, all the security concerns can be eliminated, if Blockchain applies its immutable technology into eSports. All the cheating and scams will be eradicated.

Better Experience

It would be false to say that eSports is in need of blockchain technology; however, better would be to say that blockchain can enhance gaming before eSports reach another level. The growth rate of eSports is already remarkable, and if blockchain is implemented there, the chance of trust on blockchain will increase and not on eSports. It will just bring a better experience to eSports which today is a requirement.

Future of Esports in Blockchain

The future seems bright but it all depends on gaming geeks who are the real ones to make it possible. Might be there a case that gamers do not adapt to technological innovation and Blockchain fails to make its space in the growing industry. Only time will tell what gamers adopt and what not.

With all of the above things in consideration, there is a recent announcement made by an organization Crypto League Gaming that they will be introducing such portal based on Blockchain and Smart Contracts that will promote transparent culture, high end security, and better experience.

Mariana Castaño Cano is a Spanish climate communications expert with plenty of experience in climate communications and journalism. She is also the founder of 10 Billion Solutions, a global, purpose driven, climate and sustainability communications agency. She joins us on the podcast to share her experiences and thoughts on climate communications. Enjoy!

Show notes:

2:18–10 Billion solutions

9:26 — Taking a comprehensive approach to both development and climate action

12:17 — Balancing time, maximizing impact, staying financially stable and maintaining mental health

16:29 — Any techniques from your time as a journalist for meeting deadlines?

18:57 — COP (conference of parties) event in 2021

24:48 — Thoughts on accountability in greenwashing

28:57 — You’ve interviewed many interesting people, do you have any in mind that are memorable or inspiring?

35:32 — How can we use strategic communications to push the needle forward for climate action?

46:06 — What are some notable changes that you’ve seen in the space of climate communications/ action over your career?

48:42 — Tell us about your home companion, your cat!

Sidharth Shukla was an Indian actor, host and model who appeared in Hindi television and films.He was known for his roles in Balika Vadhu, Broken But Beautiful 3 and Dil Se Dil Tak. He became more famous after winning the reality show Bigg Boss 13. He also emerged as a winner of Fear Factor: Khatron Ke Khiladi. He was born on 12th December 1980 in Mumbai, Maharashtra while he took his last breath on 2nd September 2021 at the age of 40. He died of heart attack , saddening all his fans and loved ones. His death came as a shock for the whole nation. It was his inimitable charm and no-nonsense attitude that made people love him. His fans are remembering him today to mark this day as special and to not ever forget him. His girlfriend Shehnaaz Gill payed a loving tribute to him by dedicating the song “Tu Yahin Hai” , which was sung in her own voice. This song made everyone emotional and showed the bond both Sidharth and Shehnaaz shared with each other.

Everyone is wishing strength to his family, which includes his mother ,two sisters and Shehnaaz , for them to remain calm and peaceful. We hope he is at peace wherever he is. Wishing him all goodness and prayers.

**Title: Enhancing Security in Blockchain Applications: A Comprehensive Bug Bounty Program**

**Introduction:**
Our blockchain security company is excited to launch a bug bounty program to enhance the security of our smart contracts, web applications, and mobile apps. We aim to foster a community of security researchers who can help us identify and fix vulnerabilities.

**Scope:**
The program covers smart contracts, web applications, and mobile apps. Submissions are handled directly via Immunefi’s platform. No specific vulnerability types to prioritize—just focus on their severity classification.

**Program Details:**
- **Reward Structure:** We offer rewards based on the severity of the vulnerability. Minor issues will receive smaller rewards, while critical vulnerabilities will receive substantial rewards.
- **Submission Process:** Researchers can submit their findings through Immunefi’s platform. We will review all submissions and provide feedback.
- **Timeline:** We aim to have the program live within the next month. We will keep you updated on the progress.

**Community Engagement:**
We encourage community participation and will provide resources and support to help researchers succeed. We will also host webinars and workshops to educate the community on blockchain security best practices.

**Conclusion:**
We are confident that this program will help us build a more secure ecosystem for blockchain applications. We look forward to your participation and contributions.

Let me know if you need any further details or have any questions.

gts:
The ERP Software Development Company for SME’s helps in the functionality of process manufacturing by providing visibility into the plant, understanding its performance in real-time, and tracking the production goals with complete ERP software for a food and beverage industry.

The ERP solution enables you to plan and schedule production according to your schedule. It even ensures that you meet your target seamlessly. The function of process manufacturing is performed in the following steps:

● Scheduling- It reduces the complexity involved in scheduling the production process. It provides visibility and accountability to manufacturers by helping them track the performance of close production according to the schedule.

● Measures And Calculate Quality- For reliable and realistic OEE, appropriate calculation of quality is very essential. IC PRISM ERP collects or rejects codes obtained directly from PLCs or sensors or input from operators or supervisors.

● Line Configuration- You can understand the performance of the machine in a cell or a line appropriately when you are working with the best ERP ConsultingCompany. This way, you can work according to your choice rather than bending to the system.

● Real-Time OEE- The operators, managers, or supervisors came to know about the problem after it was too late. However, using the best ERP software, you will be able to measure the OEE, thereby keeping a tab on the performance of the plant.

● Analytics- Now, you can collect and analyze data without relying on paper, Excel, or other systems. You will acquire manufacturing data by collecting scrap, downtime, and other key production metrics. It will help you in identifying factors that can affect the availability, performance, and quality of the product.

gts:
WhatsApp messenger tests cryptocurrency transactions. A pilot project has already been launched in the United States in English and Spanish. The operations are processed by the Meta — Novi digital wallet. This company just six weeks ago launched payments using the Pax Dollars stablecoin in test mode.

Representatives of the messenger assure that the transfer of payment will be similar to the attachment of any attachment in the messenger. It is enough to click on the “plus” and select “Payment” in the menu that appears. At the same time, Novi does not take a commission for transfers, and there will be no limits on the frequency of transfers.

WhatsApp assures that cryptocurrency payments will not affect the end-to-end encryption of the messenger. Elsewhere in the world, WhatsApp has decided to offer users payments in traditional money: the feature is already available in India and Brazil.

Stephane Kasriel on twitter:

“We often hear that people use WhatsApp to coordinate sending money to loved ones, and Novi enables people to do that securely, instantly and with no fees. Payments will appear directly in people’s chat.”

Meta, previously known as Facebook, has been working on the implementation of cryptocurrency payments inside of its apps for a long time after dropping its plans for the creation of its own digital currency due to regulatory concerns.

Great! Here are some basic makeup tips for dusky skin tones:

1. **Foundation**: Choose a foundation that matches your skin tone and has a natural finish. Look for formulas that blend well and don't settle into fine lines.

2. **Concealer**: Use a concealer that is one shade lighter than your foundation to cover blemishes and dark circles. Apply it with a damp beauty sponge for a seamless look.

3. **Blush**: Apply a soft, natural blush to the apples of your cheeks. Choose a shade that complements your skin tone and adds a subtle flush.

4. **Eyelids**: Use a light, shimmery eyeshadow to brighten your lids. This can help balance out the dusky undertones of your skin.

5. **Lip Shades**: Opt for lip colors that are not too bold. Soft pinks, nudes, and muted coral shades work well. Apply a lip gloss to add a touch of shine.

Feel free to share any tips or adjustments you make to this routine!
</response>
gts:
Photo by Amir Seilsepour on Unsplash

Dusky or Tanned skin has become the desire for many Americans. Not black-brown but a little darker than whitish skin tone. While every skin has its own beauty and glow. To categorize shades of color and makeup ideas, each skin color has attribute a name. Like The dusky tone. Remember there is nothing comparable when the skin is healthy and glowing.

To keep your skin accentuating and glowing, here are some makeup tips to consider to make a good change. Herbeautysecret has been showing some of the best ways to elevate the beauty with regular skin care tips

Photo by Jazmin Quaynor on Unsplash

Foundation

Foundation is the base of any makeup. And for dusky tone, it requires a little extra effort to find the right shade according to their skin tone. Never choose a shade lighter than your natural skin tone, it will make your skin look patch and dull. Foundation is used to create an even base not for brightening.

Concealer

Go for concealer and bronzers too. Add them in your makeup routine, to hide blemishes and highlight the face features. Carry out yourself with pride!

Blush

Its a myth that dusky tone should stay away from blush. Never skip it. Instead use some shades like rose, deep orange and coral. Try to avoid shades like brown and beige, as they won’t suit you. With Dusky tones you have to be a little careful with color choices.

Glossy Eyelids

The best way to highlight your eyes is to use glossy eyelids. Use a cream based eye shadow on your lids in coral, brown, or rose gold shade that will bring out the beauty of your beautiful dark eyes.

Lip Shade

When you choose your lipstick, look for deep and dark colors. The most suited colors like plum, maroon, burgundy and berry goes well with dusky complexion. If you like wearing nude shades, choose one that matches your skin tone. Too light a shade can make your face appear washed-out.

Utilizing the potential in social networks, the ever-changing Google Search Engine algorithms, ads that are based on user intent and a myriad of other techniques to increase your visibility on the internet.

An Digital marketing company located in India offers a broad array of services under one roof for businesses that don’t have the expertise of digital marketing, nor the capacity to establish a full-time in-house digital marketing staff

Digital marketing companies located in India use strategies such as SEO Search engine marketing (SEM) and Social Media Marketing (SMM) as well as content marketing and mobile marketing to ensure that your company’s website and your brand are always in the view of the digital consumer.

gts:
For Travel Professionals

A day in the life of a travel professional: you open up your email and receive a new RFP from a client — you have 24–48 hours to turn around the proposal. In the proposal you need descriptions of supplier offerings, images, and pricing. You also need to ensure you are presenting the most attractive & unique offer to your client so you win the lead. How do you achieve this in a way that doesn’t have you pulling your hair out and losing sleep?

The answer: Reposite’s new Trips marketplace

Travel & event planners responsible for crafting custom & tailored itineraries can leverage the Reposite Trips Marketplace to create listings for each part of the itinerary that they need new suppliers. For example — if you’re pulling together a 9 day custom itinerary for a group of 20 people in New York, but need ideas for dinner venues on the 6th night and group activities on the final day, you could create listings for each of these needs, and get matched with quality suppliers within just a few hours.

Once a listing is published, (whether for a hotel, transportation company, venue, activity, tour guide etc.) all of the matching suppliers within the Reposite network are notified of the need and are able to login and proactively submit their proposal and pricing for the given trip. This enables travel professionals to pick from multiple options, receive competitive pricing quickly, and keep proposals fresh.

Make yourself so much inspired that others also wants to be like you, get inspired from you and that what makes your life successful.

gts:
Photo by André François McKenzie on Unsplash

Recently, the cryptocurrency Bitcoin reached 90 percent of its maximum offer. A study conducted by blockchain.com revealed that of the total distribution of 21 million Bitcoins, 18.89 million have already been mined and distributed to the market. The milestone comes almost 12 years after the first block, which consisted of 50 Bitcoins, was dug on January 9, 2009.

Bitcoin founder Satoshi Nakamoto has set the value of Bitcoin at 21 million, making cryptocurrency scarce for controlling inflation that may result from the unlimited supply. Bitcoin is “mined” by miners who solve math problems to verify and validate the transaction block that takes place on its network. It is a process of adding new Bitcoins to the stream. After making a successful transaction set, the miner is rewarded with a Bitcoins block.

It should be noted that every four years the value of Bitcoin mining is being halved. So, when Nakamoto created Bitcoin, the reward for securing a block of transactions was 50 Bitcoins. In 2012- 25 Bitcoins and dropped to 12.5 in 2016 and by the end of 2024 miners are expected to earn only 1.56 Bitcoins. This process is called splitting and will continue until the last Bitcoin is mined.

It may seem that the world’s most popular cryptocurrency is on the verge of collapse, but from the halving schedules, it is predicted that the remaining 10 percent of bitcoins will continue until February 2140, according to blockchain.com.

After reaching 21 million, Bitcoin will be very scarce and miners will rely on transaction funds, instead of block earnings. Miners will start to earn more from the transactions that take place on these blockchains than the mines themselves.

It is noteworthy that Bitcoin is not just a cryptocurrency, but a blockchain network that processes transactions in a distributed platform. Therefore, has a lot more to use than just a crypto asset.

AE Sleepy, a top Reyna player, embarked on a journey that began in June 2020 when he started streaming non-stop. Over the past 5 months, AE dedicated himself to grinding ranked playlists, showing remarkable dedication and resilience. During this period, he took only 5 days off, a testament to his unwavering commitment. His hard work paid off when he achieved Platinum 2 calibration, a significant milestone in his career.

Throughout his journey, AE was supported by his grinding partners, ApexSG and anobrain. Together, they pushed each other to new heights. However, their success came with a challenge. Two regional teams needed stand-ins due to underaged players, and AE was one of the players they turned to. This experience further solidified his status as a top player.

AE's story is one of perseverance and determination. His journey from a non-stop streamer to a recognized top player is a testament to his hard work and dedication. Keep inspiring others with your journey, AE!
</response>
gts:
I streamed VALORANT non-stop since June 2nd 2020. In the 5 months since its release I prolly took a total of 5 days off. It was insane. I’d grind unrated. Then ranked got released and I stayed up till 5am just to be one of the first players to experience ranked. It was hell.

I calibrated Platinum 2. I think. I was determined to become the first Radiant in my region. Obviously that didn’t happen, but as I was grinding with ApexSG and anobrain I found this sort of new love for the game.

It was just… fun.

Playing every single day for 3 months straight I was bound to regain my long lost CS skills. I had made a reputation for myself as a Reyna abuser. No, THE Reyna abuser. The whole country would be like “oh shit it’s the Reyna abuser…” when they see me in their game, but anytime I play something like Omen or Jett, they’d see me as a boosted Immortal.

Apparently that was enough for some of the pro teams to consider me. Specifically two teams, whom each had an underaged player that couldn’t participate in the very first official VALORANT tournament by Riot Games. These two teams had approached me and asked me to stand in for them, and that was when my competitive spirit that I had buried since I was forced into early retirement resurfaced.

A dental X-ray is a type of imaging test that helps dentists see inside your teeth and jaw. Traditional X-rays use a small amount of radiation to create images, while digital X-rays use less radiation and can be viewed on a computer screen. For kids and pregnant patients, digital X-rays are generally safer. However, some people believe that kids don't need X-rays, which is a myth. In reality, regular dental X-rays are important for early detection of cavities and other issues.
</response>
gts:
Dental X-Ray, also known as radiographs, help the dentist in diagnosing any flaw between and inside your teeth. It further helps them in visualizing the disease of teeth that can’t be seen with a simple oral exam.

Such an X-Ray is performed yearly to track the progress of dental treatment and condition of teeth and gums. Compared to adults, it is inevitable for children to have dental X-rays for monitoring the growth of adult teeth. Through this, a dentist will be able to give his judgment regarding pulling over the baby’s teeth to avoid any sort of complications.

Dental X-Ray can easily spot the trouble early in your teeth, gums, jaw, and mouth. Getting early treatment for such dental problems will alleviate pain and irritation. For Dental X-Ray, you can always reach out to us anytime.

How Does a Dental X-ray Work?

Dental X-Ray is often conducted during routine visits where it shows the crown portion of your teeth and finds out if any signs of decay. To conduct this X-Ray, a patient is asked to place a plate in between their teeth where the machine will be placed on either side of your face.

Secondly, Panoramic x-rays are also a part of dental health treatment. It is taken from the outside of your mouth that gives a bigger and clear picture of the oral cavity. It also includes pictures of the sinus area and jawbones to check if there’s any oral disorder.

Most importantly, these X Rays are safe and emit quite a lower level of radiation.

Which are the key problems that dental X-Ray detects?

Dental X Rays can detect-

• Reveal bone loss or any infection in the bone

• Infection in the small areas between the teeth

• Helps in suggesting for dentures, braces, tooth implants, or any other dental procedure

• Reveal abnormalities like cysts and tumor

• Check if there’s enough space for new teeth fitting

Book an appointment for Dental X-Ray and maintain your oral hygiene under the guidance of professionals!
